information</h3><div class=""></div></div>
<img class="left maxw100 mg_rp10" src="images/logo/bn/aq/world-championship-ttt.png"><div class=""><ul class="infolist" style=""><li><div>Date:</div> <div>17 September 2017</div></li>
<li><div>Start time:</div> <div>15:35 </div></li>
<li><div>Avg. speed winner:</div> <div>53.31 km/h</div></li>
<li><div>Race category:</div> <div>ME - Men Elite</div></li>
<li><div>Distance: </div> <div>42.5 km</div></li>
<li><div>Points scale:</div> <div><a href="info.php?s=point-scales&amp;season=2017&amp;category=1&amp;scale=75">Worlds.TTT</a></div></li>
<li><div>UCI scale:</div> <div><a href="info.php?s=point-scales&amp;season=2017&amp;category=1&amp;pcs_uci&amp;uci&amp;scale=171">UCI.WR.Worlds.TTT</a></div></li>
<li><div>Parcours type: </div> <div><span class="icon profile p0"></span></div></li>
<li><div>ProfileScore: </div> <div></div></li>
<li><div>Vert. meters:</div> <div></div></li>
<li><div>Departure:</div> <div><a href="location/">Ravnanger</a></div></li>
<li><div>Arrival:</div> <div><a href="location/bergen">Bergen</a></div></li>
<li><div>Race ranking:</div> <div><a href="race/world-championship-ttt/2017/result/overview/race-ranking">0</a></div></li>
<li><div>Startlist quality score:</div> <div><a href="race/world-championship-ttt/2017/result/startlist/lineup-quality">612</a></div></li>
<li><div>Won how: </div> <div>Time Trial</div></li>
<li><div></div> <div></div></li>
</ul></div>
